Job Title: Loopbaanadviseur als ZZP-er door heel Nederland
Job Description: Wilt u ons team versterken met uw uitzonderlijke kwaliteiten  Solliciteer dan direct als loopbaanadviseur als zzper Ons team van loopbaanadviseurs maakt een snelle groei door en moet dringend versterkt worden met echte pros in loopbaanadviseringWie zoeken wijHet Flex Advieshuis BV zoekt enthousiaste mensgerichte loopbaanadviseurs De zzpformule van Flex Advieshuis BV biedt het persoonlijke en zelfstandige van ondernemer zijn en de voordelen van een professionele organisatie De kwaliteit en professionaliteit van Flex Advieshuis BV combineer je met je betrokkenheid en persoonlijke aandacht als lokale loopbaancoachDe Loopbaanadviseur inventariseert in gesprekken met de clint hun mogelijkheden Wanneer hijzij in kaart heeft gebracht wat de clint kan en wil, koppelt de loonbaanadviseur deze informatie aan opleidings en functiemogelijkheden Hijzij stelt samen met de clint een persoonlijk actie en ontwikkelingsplan op, welke moet leiden naar een functie die bij de wensen van de clint pas Hijzij bewaakt hierbij de opvolging om tot de best mogelijke carrire kansen voor de clint te komenSpreekt je dit aan en ben jijEn bezit jeEen afgeronde HBO opleiding richting personeel en arbeidFlex Advieshuis BV heeft zich gespecialiseerd in de begeleiding van werkzoekenden op weg naar een geschikte baan Dit doen wij door middel van individuele maatwerk trajecten, of in groepsverband dmv verschillende workshops Wij voeren onze diensten uit, in tegenstelling tot veel andere loopbaanprofessionals, vanuit het oogpunt van een recruiter Door onze jarenlange ervaring in de uitzendbranche weet Flex Advieshuis BV als geen ander waarop gelet wordt tijdens sollicitaties en kan daarmee helpen succesvoller te solliciteren

Pricing and Valuation SpecialistYou contribute to the future of NN by optimizing the use of market data to realize cost efficient valuation processesYou understand the importance of fair valuation, driven by supply and demand in the market, better than anyone Your role is critical in ensuring that all financial instruments in our Insurance portfolio are valued properly, using an efficient combination of externally sourced prices and internal valuation models In close cooperation with the specialists from asset management, you are responsible for the central procurement, calculation, validation and distribution of prices across the value chain You will work together with a team of pricing analysts in India that focuses on the execution of the daily operational pricing processes You can make a difference by optimizing these processes, introducing new processes and ensuring that they are aligned with the dynamic changes in the marketWith your positive attitude and performanceoriented motivation, you can develop and improve in your role byHere at NN, care is a core value  care for our customers as well as our employees You care for our customers needs, and as your employer, NN cares for yours We offer great development opportunities and a pleasant working environment For your career development, we offer youYou will be part of a dynamic, diverse and international team of analysts and specialists in The Hague, who are in various stages of their careers Being a senior specialist, we expect you to enjoy sharing knowledge, coaching the more junior members of the team and to guide them on their development journey Adding to the international environment the team in The Hague is supported by a team in India, that performs the daily operational processes Frequent interaction and building a relationship with the offshore team members is the key to success After work, the team also offers plenty of opportunity for recreation, out of which squash, basketball and drinks are the most recent examplesThanks to your efforts, we make our financial services relevant and more personal You and your team will contribute to costeffective operations, inspiring other NN colleagues At NN we love innovation We seek to improve and to optimize our working efficiency As a junior consultant you can help to futureproof NN for the years to come As a company, we have set up a number of subsidiaries as we have grown NN, NN Investment Partners, NationaleNederlanden, OHRA, ABN AMRO Insurance, BeFrank, Zicht, AZL and MovirWe offer you modern employment conditions and generous employee benefits For example, you have the option of taking extra vacation days We are also working towards implementing Choose your own Device You will receive your holiday allowance and yearend bonus with your salary every month, without restriction and readily available to you As a Pricing and Valuation Specialist, you will work from our beautiful office located in The Hague, which offers an easy connection via the A12Due to the coronavirus, most of the NN colleagues work from home At the moment it is unclear when we can return to the office The official location for this position is The HagueYou are an expert in financial modeling and proficient in coding VBA, C  and R You have had years of experience in the field, but you arenot afraid to admit theres much more to learn You work easily as part of a team and adapt your communications approach to work with all levels, from offshore operations to senior management You feel at home in an entrepreneurial and performanceoriented culture that enables you to further develop your talents and ideasCan you find the balance between good valuation concepts and their implementationThen we would
